Description.Text: Other amenities/services: Rooms with Safety deposit box, heating, desk, marble floors, hardwood parquet floors,bathrobe, slippers, Telephone, electric kettle, espresso machine, jacuzzi. Welcome drink, bar, lobby, living room, room service, satellite television, lounge, roof garden with panoramic view over the Aegean, veranda, breakfast room, secretarial support, laundry and dry cleaning services, concierge service.

The "Villa Selena" is in Vaporia of Hermoupolis, a listed settlement, and enjoys a view over St. Nicholaos bay and the Aegean. Most of the sights (the Apollon Theater, the Central Square, the Archaiological Museaum) can be reached on foot.
